pullrequest.title: Remove manual setting of flags for dynamic linking of the Windows CRT library

content.raw:
The typical error that you get in Visual Studio linking the VS-compiled debug version of `ign-transport` on a "proper" (i.e. using `/MDd`) Debug target is the following:
~~~
ignition-transport3.lib(NetUtils.obj) : error LNK2038: mismatch detected for 'RuntimeLibrary': value 'MD_DynamicRelease' doesn't match value 'MDd_DynamicDebug' in server_main.obj
~~~
content.html:
The typical error that you get in Visual Studio linking the VS-compiled debug version of ign-transport on a "proper" (i.e. using /MDd) Debug target is the following:

ignition-transport3.lib(NetUtils.obj) : error LNK2038: mismatch detected for 'RuntimeLibrary': value 'MD_DynamicRelease' doesn't match value 'MDd_DynamicDebug' in server_main.obj
